scripts.lint:build: mv ./out/_next ./out/next && cd ./out && grep -rl '/_next' * | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g' && cd ..
scripts.lint:build-osx: mv ./out/_next ./out/next && cd ./out && grep -rli '_next' * | xargs -I@ sed -i '' 's|/_next|/next|g' @ && cd ..;
scripts.build: next build && next export && npm run lint:build
scripts.build-osx: next build && next export && npm run lint:build-osx
scripts.build-chrome: npm run build && npm run prepare-chrome
scripts.build-chrome-osx: npm run build-osx && npm run prepare-chrome
scripts.build-firefox: npm run build && npm run prepare-firefox
scripts.build-firefox-osx: npm run build-osx && npm run prepare-firefox
